name: Don't Enter the Forest
summary:
Don’t enter the Forest is a short sci-fi exploration game about getting lost in a forest.
Your car breaks down in the forest and you get lost. Very quickly you discover that there is more going on than in an ordinary forest.
You decide in which direction you walk. But your decisions could lead you to various places and endings!

Discover a sci-fi short story!
Get lost in the forest!
Discover 3 different endings!
18 achievements!
Playtime 30min - 2h!
